desc.cn: Obsidian 是一个功能强大且可扩展的知识库应用程序，可以在纯文本注释的本地文件夹之上工作
desc.en: Obsidian is a powerful and extensible knowledge base application that works on top of your local folder of plain text notes

darwin/brew.cmd: brew tap yakitrak/yakitrak && brew install yakitrak/yakitrak/obs

(win|wsl2)/scoop.cmd:
x scoop bucket add scoop-yakitrak https://github.com/yakitrak/scoop-yakitrak.git \
&& x scoop install obs
